title: NER tagger
description: NER tagger for alt text. Accessed as 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.ner'.

clipscore.description: The CLIPScore of the image, a metric used to evaluate the quality of an automatic image captioning system. (CLIPScore: A Reference-free Evaluation Metric for Image Captioning)
clipscore.title: clipscore

alt text.description: The alt text extracted from the html
alt text.title: alt text

ner.description: A list object of {word, tag, index} detected by the NER model.e.g. [{'value': 'UN', 'tag': 'ORGANIZATION', 'index': 5}, {'value': 'Manhattan', 'tag': 'LOCATION', 'index': 7}]
ner.title: ner

value.description: The entity recognized from the input alt text string.

tag.description: The entity tag recognized by the model.

index.description: Zero-index of where this entity is if the text input is split by word.
The index of the entity within the sentence - the n'th word in the alt text (starting from 1)

items.description: An entity detected by the NER model.
